caption: A man was arrogantly commanding the people around him, and some of those nearby began to resist, led by an elderly figure. This elderly figure seemed to be the man's mentor, but the man didn't hold his mentor in high regard. He resorted to physical violence against his mentor, who displayed deep anger. Eventually, the man took his mentor aside and killed him, leaving the onlookers in shock.Meanwhile, a group of individuals was walking across a snowy landscape, dressed in black attire, engaged in conversation as they moved. There were four of them, seemingly on a mission of some sort.In another room, an elderly man was assisting a young girl, providing her with some form of service or aid.
